name: blip
description: A plugin that will allow a blip representation of an instance that is offscreen to be shown and much more with customizable settings!

scripts.build: bun run bun-build.ts && npx tsc --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly --declarationMap false --sourceMap false && bun run replace-version.ts
scripts.build:dist: bun run build && bun run build:docs

author: https://github.com/doubleactii
